data.title: Four arrested for B8m robbery of Ukrainian
data.description: Police have arrested four  foreign suspects  in the 8-million-baht  crypto currency armed holdup  of a  Ukrainian  in Phuket.

data.title: Red Bull Skate Park at Benjakitti Park | The Nation in Brief
data.description: If you're still hyped about the exciting skateboarding events at the Olympic Games Paris 2024, today we're taking you to explore how this project is redefining Thai skateboard culture.

data.title: Thai wheelchair- racing athlete explains ban for anti-doping violation
data.description: Prawat Wahoram says he never used banned substances, and ban resulted from missing tests through oversight

data.title: Relaxation and Rejuvenation The Salil Hotel Riverside
data.description: The Salil Hotel Riverside – Bangkok offers more than just riverside accommodations; it provides an experience rooted in the "Journey of Dreams" concept, elevating hospitality through six essential components: Stay, Taste, Relax, Shop, Socialize, and Work.

data.title: Sin at new heights
data.description: Avani+ Riverside Bangkok Hotel will open Sin, Bangkok

data.title: Bangkokians urged to mask up as PM2.5 levels hit dangerous zones
data.description: Air pollution rises beyond safe limits in several districts of the capital, prompting the Bangkok Metropolitan Administration to issue a warning

data.title: Fresh typhoon hits northern Philippines as crop damage rises
data.description: A tropical storm that strengthened over the weekend made landfall as a typhoon in the northern Philippines, as the country grapples with millions of dollars in crop damage from a series of relentless cyclones this year.

data.title: Fabricio Andrade dares Jonathan Haggerty to fight him in MMA as he gets set for ONE Championship return
data.description: Fabricio Andrade has dared Jonathan Haggerty to carry out his threat of chasing him down to MMA, as he finally gets set to return to ONE Championship.

data.title: 2 key Bangkok motorways to be toll-free during New Year holidays
data.description: Toll waiver on Bangkok-Chonburi-Pattaya and outer ring road to  be effective from December 26 to January 2 in a bid to ease congestion

data.title: Govt denies Thai-Cambodian run-ins on Koh Kut
data.description: The government dismissed reports of confrontations between Thai soldiers and their Cambodian counterparts on  Koh Kut  as fake news while insisting the tourism situation on the island is still good.

data.title: World Film Series in Bangkok ends with Romanian movie
data.description: The 2024 Contemporary World Film Series will conclude with the screening of 6.9 On The Richter Scale, at TK Park

data.title: Demetrious Johnson called out for ‘fourth dance’ in ONE Championship by Adriano Moraes
data.description: Adriano Moraes has tried to lure Demetrious Johnson out of retirement for a “fourth dance” after making his long-awaited return to ONE Championship in style.

data.title: Senegalese president congratulates Reug Reug on ONE Championship title win in Bangkok
data.description: Oumar “Reug Reug” Kane warned Anatoly Malykhin he is coming for his light heavyweight MMA title next after dethroning ONE Championship’s heavyweight king on Saturday in Bangkok – with Senegal’s President even sending his congratulations.

data.title: Fengshui master arrested in alleged B108m fraud
data.description: Police arrested a popular  fengshui master  near Bangkok on Monday morning for alleged  public fraud  after complaints he had failed to deliver promised " auspicious objects " that cost followers about  108   million baht  in total.

data.title: Four foreigners arrested over 8m crypto heist in Phuket

data.title: Nineteen medal haul for Thai athletes in the Maldives
data.description: Thailand claims overall third place at the World Bodybuilding and Fitness Championships with 5 gold, 7 silver, and 7 bronze medals

data.title: Lisa wins 2 awards at MTV Europe, Taylor Swift the big winner
data.description: Thai singer Lisa of supergirl group Blackpink received two awards, for best collaboration in a song and biggest fans, at the MTV Europe Music Awards, held in Manchester, England, on Sunday night.

data.title: Music legend Quincy Jones dies at 91
data.description: Quincy Jones, the legendary record producer, composer, and arranger whose transformative influence on American music spanned more than seven decades, has passed away at 91. His publicist, Arnold Robinson, confirmed that Jones died peacefully at his Bel Air home due to complications from pneumonia.

data.description: Police arrested a popular  fengshui master  near Bangkok on Monday morning for alleged  public fraud  after complaints he had failed to deliver promised " auspicious objects " that cost followers about  10   0 million baht  in total.

data.title: Forestry protection officers attacked, valuable rosewood logs stolen
data.description: The gang, who also disabled CCTV cameras in the area, are thought to be familiar with the area of forest in which the attack took place

data.title: Indian tourist found dead after falling down Samui waterfall
data.description: SURAT THANI - Searchers have found and recovered the body of an  Indian tourist  who  fell from a cliff  while walking to the top of a popular  waterfall  on Koh Samui.

data.title: Fengshui master arrested for alleged B70m fraud
data.description: Police arrested a popular fengshui master near Bangkok on Monday morning for alleged public fraud after complaints he had failed to deliver promised "auspicious objects" that cost followers about  70 million in total.

data.title: PM heads to Los Angeles and Lima for a week of meetings
data.description: Thai delegation combines participation at APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting in Peruvian capital an official visit to Los Angeles

data.title: Myanmar meets less than 50% of power demand amid fuel and line disruptions
data.description: The Ministry of Electric Power has stated that only around 50% of the electricity demand can currently be generated and distributed due to the destruction of power lines, a decrease in electricity generation from natural gas plants, and ongoing maintenance efforts caused by flooding.

data.title: Pilot programme allowing Vietnamese to gamble in casinos extended
data.description: The Vietnamese government is extending the pilot programme to allow Vietnamese to gamble in casinos.

data.title: EV and straight-six options
data.description: The BMW M3 will return for a seventh generation with the choice of either a straight-six turbo petrol engine or a high-tech EV powertrain with huge power and unprecedented dynamic ability.
